title: Missing the Bus Right Before My Eyes

korean: 오늘 아침에 정류장으로 가는데, 멀리서 버스가 오는 게 보이더라고.
조금만 더 빨리 걸으면 될 것 같아서 속도를 냈어.
근데 막상 거의 다 도착했을 때 버스가 딱 정류장에 서 있는 거야.
나는 손 흔들면서 뛰어갔는데, 진짜 몇 미터 남았을 때 버스 문이 닫혔어.
눈앞에서 버스가 그냥 떠나버리는 걸 보니까 진짜 황당했어, 솔직히.
기사님이 나를 못 본 건지, 아니면 본 척 안 한 건지 모르겠더라고.
어쨌든 버스는 가버렸고, 나는 정류장에서 헛웃음만 나왔어.
시간표 보니까 다음 버스까지 20분을 기다려야 하는 거야.
그냥 서서 기다리기엔 너무 긴 시간이라서 짜증 났어.
핸드폰 꺼내서 시간 때우면서 기다렸는데, 진짜 지루하더라고.
다음 버스가 왔을 때는 이번엔 놓치지 말아야지 하고 미리 준비했어.
아침부터 이렇게 운이 없으니까, 오늘 하루가 좀 걱정되더라고.
english: So like, this morning I was walking to the bus stop and I could see the bus coming from far away.
I thought if I walked just a bit faster I'd make it, so I sped up.
But when I almost got there the bus was literally just sitting at the stop.
I was running and waving my hand, and honestly when I was like a few meters away the bus doors closed.
Watching the bus just leave right before my eyes was honestly so frustrating.
I don't know if the driver didn't see me or just pretended not to see me, you know?
Anyway the bus left, and I was just standing at the stop with this awkward laugh.
I checked the schedule and I had to wait 20 minutes for the next bus.
It was too long to just stand and wait so I was pretty annoyed.
I took out my phone and killed time while waiting, but it was really boring.
When the next bus came I was like, I can't miss this one, so I prepared in advance.
Starting the morning with such bad luck made me kinda worried about the rest of the day.
